title: AED Game Character Voice - The Paladin
description: Take up the mantle of righteousness with The Paladin, a pious and valiant hero daringly committed to the pursuit of justice in a world plagued by darkness.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Album Art by Dalton Webb


AED Game Character Voice - The Paladin voice-over sound library provides you with more than 300+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding game-play audio experiences.Â 


The Paladin's voice profile is deep, stoic and filled with holy energy. He is perfect for Paladin, Knight or Cleric in-game non-player characters or any Hero game characters filled with the light. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in a clean and dry audio format in case you want to further process the vocals with effects.


Features:


-Vocal Profile: Rich, Baritone, Male, Heroic, Stoic, Strong

- Perfect for NPC's in game and/or film based trailers.

-Featuring custom lines and NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack, Always vigilant always watchful. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.

-Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping and pain vocalizations to fully flesh out your next hero or villain in game!

-Works with any DAW or Game Engine

- Royalty Free and YouTube friendly

- Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Male voice-over audio files

111 MB of voice samples

All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format


Number of Audio Waves: 353


Number of Audio Cues: 353


Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit


Do Sound FX loop: No


Windows: Yes


Mac: Yes
